item.title: Lola Okuyiga - Fashion Consultant
item.content:encoded:
Lola Okuyiga

|

Lola Okuyiga |

BUYING AND COLLABORATIONS CONSULTANT

Lola Okuyiga has a decade of experience in creating and buying successful fashion brands for global leaders like Farfetch and ASOS. She's curated sell-out collections generating £250m+ in sales through her love for tech and product.

About Lola

WORK HIGHLIGHTS

  • Menswear Collaborations

    View

  • Womens Luxury Sport Launches

    View

  • Sneaker Collaborations

    View

  • Iconic Licenses

    View

  • Premium Own Label

    View

Create

Curate

Collaborate

Create Curate Collaborate

I had the privilege of working on a variety of successful men's and unisex collaborations with luxury and contemporary brands. These collaborations included activations at the prestigious London luxury boutique Browns Fashion, which is part of the Farfetch Group. The collaborations spanned across various categories such as jewelry, sneakers, tailoring, and outerwear, and many of these collections quickly sold out.

MENSWEAR + UNISEX LUXURY AND CONTEMPORARY COLLABORATIONS

→ Gallery

I had the pleasure of being hired by Browns Fashion to launch their Women's sportswear and lifestyle category as a business priority for owner Farfetch Group. We onboarded and partnered with multiple established and emerging brands to launch an edit of the best in-line and exclusive pieces across lifestyle and performance, both in-store and online.

WOMEN’S LUXURY SPORTSWEAR AND LIFESTYLE

→ Gallery

SNEAKER COLLABORATIONS

Multiple shoes, across 4 drops designed in collaboration with major sportswear brands, including Reebok, Saucony, and Le Coq Sportif, as part of ASOS' premium sub-label, ASOS White. Achieved sell-out of first-time women's drops.

→ Gallery

ARTISTS + iconic licences

Collaborated with great teams to create multiple sell-out and one award-winning collections with iconic household names including Disney, Star Wars, Hello Kitty, and others.

→ Gallery

I had the pleasure of being hired by Browns Fashion to launch their Women's sportswear and lifestyle category as a business priority for owner Farfetch Group. We onboarded and partnered with multiple established and emerging brands to launch an edit of the best in-line and exclusive pieces across lifestyle and performance, both in-store and online.

HOME + LIFESTYLE

→ Gallery

I had the pleasure of being hired by Browns Fashion to launch their Women's sportswear and lifestyle category as a business priority for owner Farfetch Group. We onboarded and partnered with multiple established and emerging brands to launch an edit of the best in-line and exclusive pieces across lifestyle and performance, both in-store and online.

PREMIUM OWN-LABEL LAUNCHES AND DEVELOPMENT

→ View gallery

item.content:encoded:
SCHEDULE YOUR CALL

View availability and book a session. It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

item.title: Blog Post Title Four
item.content:encoded:
It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

Don’t worry about sounding professional. Sound like you. There are over 1.5 billion websites out there, but your story is what’s going to separate this one from the rest. If you read the words back and don’t hear your own voice in your head, that’s a good sign you still have more work to do.

Be clear, be confident and don’t overthink it. The beauty of your story is that it’s going to continue to evolve and your site can evolve with it. Your goal should be to make it feel right for right now. Later will take care of itself. It always does.
item.excerpt:encoded: It all begins with an idea.
item.dc:creator: lolaokuyiga@gmail.com

item.title: Services
item.content:encoded:
STANDARD PACKAGE

Package includes:

  • 30 Minute session

  • Color grading + retouching

  • A private online gallery with 5+ digital images delivered 2-3 weeks from the session

  • Best for client go-sees, online portfolio, professional social media presence

$180 | Purchase Package

DELUXE PACKAGE

Package includes:

  • 2 hour session

  • 1-2 wardrobe changes

  • Color grading + retouching

  • A private online gallery with 18+ digital images delivered 3-5 weeks from the session

  • Best for client go-sees, online portfolio, social media, special occasions (birthdays, anniversaries)

$250 | Purchase Package

PROFESSIONAL PACKAGE

Package includes:

  • 3 hour session

  • 3 wardrobe changes

  • Color grading + retouching

  • Multiple models

  • A private online gallery with 24+ digital images delivered 4-6 weeks from the session

  • Best for indie agencies and print campaigns

$300 | Purchase Package

ELITE PACKAGE

Package includes:

  • 3 hour session

  • Unlimited wardrobe changes

  • Color grading + retouching

  • Multiple models

  • A private online gallery with 36+ digital images delivered 6-8 weeks from the session

  • Best for agencies and industry clients

$500 | Purchase Package

item.content:encoded:
